ygData.subject: Re: Rondo?
ygData.msgSnippet: He s part of the Parrying Pick Quest ( a dwarf Rogue only weapon ).  Talk to a NPC named Diggins in Kaladim and he will tell you what to do. Lance ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
He's part of the Parrying Pick Quest ( a dwarf Rogue only weapon ). Talk to
a NPC named Diggins in Kaladim and he will tell you what to do.

Lance


-----Original Message-----
From: Squires, Dean [mailto:DeanSquires@...]

To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Subject: [EverQuest] Rondo?


From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>

Anyone familiar with Rondo in Crushbone? Know anything about an
associated quest to retrieve his tongue?

Baelstorm
Level 10 Human Cleric
Solusek Ro
